layman_description: I'm feeling really congested, and my nose is stuffy and runny. My throat is a bit sore too. Overall, I'm just really uncomfortable with these allergy symptoms.

layman_description: I feel like my mouth is always dry and my tongue is sore. I have trouble tasting food and sometimes I feel really tired.

layman_description: I feel congested and have facial discomfort. My eyes hurt, and I have postnasal drip. I also get dizzy when I move my head quickly.
original_description: Patient having severe sinusitis about two to three months ago with facial discomfort, nasal congestion, eye pain, and postnasal drip symptoms.

layman_description: I feel tired and a bit fussy. I have no fever or rash right now.

original_description: This is a 14-month-old baby boy Caucasian who came in with presumptive diagnosis of Kawasaki with fever for more than 5 days and conjunctivitis, mild arthritis with edema, rash, resolving and with elevated neutrophils and thrombocytosis, elevated CRP and ESR.

layman_description: I'm wheezing and coughing a lot. My chest feels tight and it's hard to breathe. I also feel some pain in my belly and have vomited a few times.
original_description: Mother states he has been wheezing and coughing.

layman_description: I feel some swelling around my mouth and have occasional trouble with allergies to grass and other things in the air.
original_description: Acute allergic reaction, etiology uncertain, however, suspicious for Keflex.
